parameters.name: all
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all custom labels. This parameter takes effect only when `tag_keys` is left empty. Valid values:

*   `true`: Remove all custom labels.
*   `false`: Do not remove all custom labels.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: The region ID of the resources.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: The type of resource. Set the value to `CLUSTER`.

parameters.name: tag_keys
parameters.description: The list of keys of the labels that you want to remove.
